content.title: Create a New Object Service
content.body:
1. In the Configure Object Service window, provide the name of object service: SalesforceSample.
    Other fields such as - Endpoints type (Salesforce), Security Level (Authenticated App User) and Version are pre-filled.
  2. Select the Specify Login Endpoint in the Authentication section.
  3. Provide the following data from your salesforce application in the Authentication section:
    • Client ID
    • Client Secret
    • UserID and Password - Your Salesforce UserID and Password (Password appended with Security Token).
  4. Click Save & Generate.
    The Import Objects from Backend window appears.
